catalog_info.title: Research Workshop in Comparative Politics
catalog_info.notes: Doctoral students from other departments and faculties admitted if space permits.
catalog_info.description: The workshop offers advanced graduate students an opportunity to present their work-in-progress, benefit from critiques of it, and discuss theoretical and methodological issues. Part two of a two part series. Students must complete both parts of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
